summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4599 for the improvement of East Prospect Street, from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 533576 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
